changes_short: Reworked buyback cost and assist gold system.

general.name: General
general.description: This version is focused on changing how the gold and buyback formulas work

general.name: General_3
general.description: Costul răscumpărării a fost modificat de la 100 + ( nivel * nivel * 1,5) + (timp * 0,25) la 100 + valoarea netă / 13

general.name: General_4
general.description: Buyback no longer reduces gold earned after respawning

general.name: General_6
general.description: AoE gold for the losing team no longer scales with the overall team networth difference, just the individual networth of the dying hero. Previously, a core on your team doing really well meant that a support on your team dying gave an increasing amount of gold to the enemy.

general.name: General_8
general.description: -The comeback component is now just (DyingHeroNetWorth * 0.026 + 70) / # of killers

general.name: General_8_info
general.description:
This takes the place of the components below that considers NetWorth  
For example in the 1 killer case, it replaces (NetWorthEarlyFactor * 90 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375)
Like the previous formula, it is only given to the losing team

general.name: General_10
general.description: The gold multiplier based on the dying hero's net worth rank changed from 1.2/1.1/1.0/0.9/0.8 to 1.2/1.05/0.9/0.75/0.6

general.name: General_12
general.description: Pentru referință, formula pentru aurul oferit într-o zonă este listată mai jos:

general.name: General_14
general.description: Terms:

general.name: General_16
general.description: NetWorthDifference = ( EnemyTeamNetWorth / AlliedTeamNetWorth ) - 1 [With a min of zero and a max of 1]

general.name: General_17
general.description: NetWorthFactor = NetWorthDifference * VictimNetWorth

general.name: General_18
general.description: NetWorthEarlyFactor (for when Enemy has more NW) = ( EnemyTeamNetWorth - AlliedTeamNetWorth ) / 4000 [Has a max of 1]

general.name: General_19
general.description: NetWorthPoorFactor = 1.3 - 0.1 * NetWorthRank (dying's hero's networth rank)

general.name: General_20
general.description: NetWorthRankingFactor (hero's rank amongst allies involved in the kill): For 1/2/3/4/5 from poorest to richest are: { 1 } / { 1.3, 0.7 } / { 1.3, 1.0, 0.7 } / { 1.3, 1.1, 0.9, 0.7 } / { 1.3, 1.15, 1.0, 0.85, 0.7}

general.name: General_22
general.description: Formula:

general.name: General_24
general.description: 1 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 126 + 4.5 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 90 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375 )

general.name: General_25
general.description: 2 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 63 + 3.6 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 67.5 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375 )

general.name: General_26
general.description: 3 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 31.5 + 2.7 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 45 + NetWorthFactor * 0.03375 )

general.name: General_27
general.description: 4 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 22.5 + 1.8 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 31.5 + NetWorthFactor * 0.027 )

general.name: General_28
general.description: 5 Killer: NetWorthPoorFactor * NetWorthRankingFactor * ( 18 + 0.9 * VictimLevel + NetWorthEarlyFactor * 22.5 + NetWorthFactor * 0.02025 )

general.description: The upcoming patches will be mostly focused on balance tweaks in preparation for The International. There are a few more biweekly patches planned, with the primary ones scheduled around the final Major and the TI Qualifiers. After TI, we expect the first half of the new season to have longer periods between gameplay updates.

general.name: General
general.description: Added new Scepter upgrades for all of the 24 remaining heroes without an upgrade

general.description: Updated various older Scepter upgrades

general.description: Scepter can now be consumed as a buff by purchasing a 2000 gold recipe upgrade. Scepter buffs do not grant secondary stat bonuses

general.name: General_4
general.description: Roshan now drops a consumable Scepter buff item. The third Roshan will randomly drop either a consumable Scepter item or a Refresher Shard. The fourth Roshan has both. You can select Roshan to see his inventory and find out what items will drop
